00010 #ifndef _cb_ASSERT_H_
00011 #define _cb_ASSERT_H_
00012 
00013 #include "cb_comdefs.h"
00014 
00015 #ifdef NDEBUG
00016 #include "cb_os.h"
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 #ifdef __cplusplus
00020 extern "C" {
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 
00024 /*===========================================================================
00025  * DEFINES
00026  *=========================================================================*/
00027 
00028 /*
00029  * Internal platform function declaration.
00030  * Shall never be called directly.
00031  */
00032 
00033 extern void cbOS_error(cb_int32 errorCode, const cb_char *file, cb_uint32 line);
00034 extern void cbOS_error2(const cb_char *file, cb_uint32 line);
00035 
00036 #ifndef NASSERT
00037 
00038 #ifndef __CB_FILE__
00039     #define __CB_FILE__ __FILE__
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * If the condition (C) evaluates to FALSE, the registered error handler in cbOS
00044  * is called with file and line info before the system is reset.
00045  */
00046 
00047 #define cb_ASSERT(C)    do { if(!(C)){cbOS_error2(__CB_FILE__,__LINE__);} } while(0)
00048 
00049 #define cb_ASSERTC(C)   do { if(!(C)){cbOS_error2(__CB_FILE__ , __LINE__);} } while(0)
00050 
00051 #define cb_ASSERT2(C, E) do { if(!(C)){cbOS_error(E, __CB_FILE__ , __LINE__);} } while(0)
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * The registered error handler is called with the file and line info before a system reset.
00055  */
00056 
00057 #define cb_EXIT(E) do { cbOS_error(((cb_int32)(E)), __CB_FILE__, __LINE__); } while(0)
00058 
00059 
00060 #else
00061 
00062 #define cb_ASSERT(C)
00063 
00064 #define cb_ASSERTC(C) do {  if(!(C)){cbWD_systemReset();} } while(0) // Critical assert is never removed.
00065 
00066 #define cb_ASSERT2(C, E)
00067 
00068 #define cb_EXIT(E) do { cbWD_systemReset(); } while(0)
00069 
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 
00073 /*===========================================================================
00074  * TYPES
00075  *=========================================================================*/
00076 
00077 #ifdef __cplusplus
00078 }
00079 #endif

00081 #endif /* _cb_ASSERT_H_ */
